short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the cosmos with Astronaut Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring a mesmerizing scene of an astronaut drifting in space, this extension brings the vastness of the universe to your new tab. Quickly access your favorite sites with popular shortcuts, add custom links, and stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the beauty of outer space with an astronaut in focus.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites with ease.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with frequently visited links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time with an integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web seamlessly with your default engine.
Discover more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
